mapper.select: SELECT vm.mission_id,count(km.reply_id) as count FROM volun_to_mission AS vm, kid_to_mission AS km WHERE vm.volun_id = #{volunId} AND vm.mission_id = km.mission_id AND km.reply_id IS NOT NULL group by vm.mission_id

with temp as( SELECT m.id, m.tag,m.title,m.description,m.type,m.level,m.point,m.date FROM volun_to_mission AS vm,kid_mission AS m WHERE vm.volun_id = #{volunId} AND vm.mission_id = m.id ) select* from temp where date = (SELECT MAX(date) FROM temp)
select km.mission_id, count(kr.id) as count from kid_to_mission as km left join kid_reply as kr on km.reply_id = kr.id and kr.score is not null group by km.mission_id

SELECT m.id as id, m.tag as tag,m.title as title,m.description as description,m.type as type,m.level as level,m.point as point,m.date as date FROM volun_to_mission AS vm,kid_mission AS m WHERE vm.volun_id = #{volunId} AND vm.mission_id = m.id ORDER BY m.date DESC
SELECT k.id as kidId,k.photo as kidPic,k.name as kidName FROM kid_to_mission as km, kid as k WHERE km.mission_id = #{missionId} AND km.kid_id = k.id AND km.reply_id is not null

SELECT va.id, va.author_name, va.content_pic, va.author_pic, va.title, va.content, va.article_time, COUNT(vac.article_id) AS amount FROM volun_article AS va LEFT JOIN volun_article_comment AS vac ON va.id = vac.article_id WHERE va.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') GROUP BY va.id
select vac.content,v.name,v.photo,vac.time from volunteer as v ,volun_article_comment as vac where v.id = vac.volun_id and vac.volun_id = #{articleId} order by vac.time desc

select a.id,a.author_name,a.content_pic,a.author_pic,a.title,a.content,a.article_time,count(*) as amount from volun_article_comment as vac, volun_article_like as val , volun_article as a where val.volun_id = #{volunId} and vac.article_id = val.article_id and vac.article_id = a.id group by a.id order by a.article_time desc
SELECT * FROM kid WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT vk.kid_id FROM volun_to_kid AS vk WHERE vk.volun_id = #{volunId} AND vk.kid_id = kid.id )
